about_the_game:
Do you want to come to this city? Let me tell you from the beginning that this city has its own unique rules. If you want to do car trading in this city, you need to establish a company and obtain a license. After doing these, it would be nice to buy yourself a gallery. If your money is not enough, it's easy to get a loan from a bank. You can start trading by buying one of the cars for sale on the city's streets. Everyone's story starts on the streets anyway. Would you like me to give you more information? Sure, but first click on the Wishlist button above to follow me.If you follow me, I already share everything that's happening in the city, so you can learn from there.


While you are driving around the city with your car, you can go hunting for vehicles, if you haven't bought a house yet, you can go to a hotel and spend the night. Since you will spend a lot of time in the city with your car, a fast vehicle will return to you as more snow.



Develop your showroom and ensure that more customers visit you. Seize the opportunity to earn more income with the additional features you will gain.



Customize your cars and sell them at a higher price. Selling customized cars will gain you popularity in the city and bring you customers who want to customize their cars.




Looking for some excitement? Then the black market is just for you. Some cars can only be obtained through the black market.
Remember, these vehicles are illegal and there is always a risk of being scammed while trying to obtain them!




The city junkyard will be an essential destination for you. You will obtain the parts you need for vehicle repairs from here.


    KEY FEATURES
  • You can drive any car that belongs to you, and having a fast car while driving around the city can help you earn more money.
  • Selling a car directly may not always yield a good profit. You can make more money by repairing or customizing a car, or even obtaining a rental license to rent it out.
  • Some cars may have a much higher actual value, and you need to work with an expert company to learn about it.
  • You need to have a license for many operations you will perform in the city, and you can do any job that you can obtain a license for. While some licenses are easy to obtain, for others, you need to win an auction.
  • You will participate in auctions and bid at many points in the game, which may be for a lost profession license or a seized car.
  • You can improve your garage, and these improvements will give you extra features.
  • It is possible to make money through some illegal methods in the game, such as stealing cars at night and selling them. You can see more in the game.
  • You can reduce your workload in the game by finding colleagues to work with.

Do you want to come to this city? Let me tell you from the beginning that this city has its own unique rules. If you want to do car trading in this city, you need to establish a company and obtain a license. After doing these, it would be nice to buy yourself a gallery. If your money is not enough, it's easy to get a loan from a bank. You can start trading by buying one of the cars for sale on the city's streets. Everyone's story starts on the streets anyway. Sure, but first click on the Wishlist button above to follow me.If you follow me, I already share everything that's happening in the city, so you can learn from there.

name: Car Dealer's Life

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64 bit)
  • Processor: İntel i5 series 3.0 GHz
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050ti 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64 bit)
  • Processor: İntel i7 series 3.0 GHz
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060 6 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Can you succeed as a car dealer? If your answer is yes, start your business by purchasing cars in the city. Remember that you can repair, rent, customize, and have them evaluated by an expert before selling your vehicles.
